title: For every rehabilitation tenements, (3) (---) 1 Parking Space (3) (---) for two wheeler shall be provided
clause_text: For every rehabilitation tenements, (3) (---) 1 Parking Space (3) (---) for two wheeler shall be provided. (3) (---) (3) In addition 1 parking space for three wheeler vehicle for every 20 rehabilitation tenaments shall be provided. (3)
